SPECIAL THANKS Thanks my love Yu Wu and Sprinkle <3 Love to my family: Carly, Adelaide and Jensen, and my other family: Sanzaru! Special Thanks to Goody Wu, and my cats BubbleTea and Yeti Special Thanks to Ana Connie Li Moran Special thanks to my amazing family – Nikki, Sarah, and Billy Hogs and Quiches to Eli O, Nico and Cindyloohoo for the truckloads of support! Love and thanks to my mother, Gail Reilly, for always supporting me. For Kristen, Alex, and Arthur. Adventure always! In loving memory of Bruce. To Rebecca for supporting me all these years and helping me to do my best work. Sarah Kay, Grant, and Natalie Bertero for all their support! Clarisa San Diego - Calvin San Diego - Mike Halpern - Rocco Balsamo IV Thanks to Donna, Yuki, Chip, Raf, Rene and Falcon. <3 Wanjun and Dusty Thanks to my brother, Arturo Flores for driving me around during lockdown! I would like to thank F4e V4lentine, my baby Khajiit for inspiration. Otsuka family To Elizabeth for all her support, and to my two wonderful sons Gianleo & Luca! ShupaMikey Caitlin and Ben for all the support, love, and encouragement. Thanks to Didi and Ari for the love and Cheerios To Nivan, my tempestuous wolf who pushes me to the best of myself. In Lak’ech. My wife Sharona, both daughters Shanie and Meshi as well as Lev the Portie Dennis Lingad Special thanks to Mamamoo and Yu Feng for inspirations. Luke, for your endless patience, and Chica <3 Jared Bartlett thanks his family - Elizabeth, Jude, Anna Lee, Ramona and Eddie For Gianna and Jude, in memory of John Rossi Tate, Landon, Krystina, Art. In memory of Jim Huang. Ching Poon Yuen and Editha Garcia with the Ops Logistics on Software Acquisition Thank you to Alicia, Ilaria, Leo and Paulie Sico, my beautiful family! Thank you Lesley and Poe for coming along and supporting me on this adventure :) My wife (Thu) and my kids (Amelia Harriet, Ava, and Wukong) Lynne Butner, Jonathan Butner, Emily Butner To Jordan, Sebastian & the whole Clark/Patz fam for their support & inspiration. My loving wife Bridget for her endless support. Thank you: Appa-Amma-Ramya-Anjali-Aadhi Nope and Suddenly, best cats ever. And Leo, who's ok I guess. Sudha Manigundam Raghavan Andrea and Magnolia. Wubu. Tara, Mia & Neenee Evans, Barbara Jewett My mom, my husband, Florence & Olivia. In loving memory of Hyman L. Robinson Jr. Thalia Lietz and Sophie My loving companions: Monique, Fritz, Ulna, and Pippi Les Vollmer for being my biggest fan. Katy Vollmer who enabled the time it took. Luke & Seraphina Ryan thanks his wife Linh and their two dogs, Bastian and Beegee. Jenny and Elizabeth: Thanks for putting up with a ship-mode Ryan. Love Ya! For support from a great family Graci, Kate, Andrew, and Liam Thanks to Chekhov for always being the cutest lovable cat in our time in need. Claire Moon, who put a paintbrush in my hand Grateful to be part of this team. Thank you so much!! Nick and Tofu Heather Beirnes Ryan, Landon, Harper & Crawford Susan, Matthew and Tegan! Thanks to Rachelle, Kaira, Kaylee, Kaydence and Sean Connery!!
